## Magasin main project

- [unicef/magasin](https://github.com/unicef/magasin)
    - Primary user code repository with Dagster pipelines, Jupytext notebooks, and Docker images.

## Libraries and utilities
- [unicef/superset-dashboard-cloner](https://github.com/unicef/superset-dashboard-cloner)
    Scripts for cloning Apache Superset dashboards to create copies that use different data sources.

## Custom Helm charts

- [unicef/magasin-drill](https://github.com/unicef/magasin-drill)
    A helm chart that allows setting up Apache Drill in cluster mode together with Zookeeper in a Kubernetes cluster.
